title: 2 bedrooms, 1 Bath and 1 Kitchen Private Unit
posting_body: This is a Private two bedrooms, one bath and one kitchen unit which has its own private entrance.
All bedrooms have windows and furnished with beds, desks and chairs.
Move in condition.
A full-size kitchen is equipped with appliances, microwave, and everything you need to make yourself a meal after a long day.
Please keep the kitchen tidy after use.

This private unite is located at Sunset Parkside near Sunset Blvd and It is very close to public transportation worries behind where having a car isn't necessary, half block you will find major bus lines such as N Muni and 29.
It is convenient to (20 Minutes) UCSF, SFSU, SF downtown, AAU and GGU.
There are also washer and dryer available for use.
Street Parking only.
Requirements:
a. Non-smoker, no drug, no pet, and no party
b. Provide 2 resent month paystubs and/or bank records, etc.
c. Verification:
Current Full Credit Report with Scores and a copy of Driver License.
Cost:
a. Cleaning and security fee $650
b.
A month rent and last month rent
c. Utilities and internet are not included
If you are interested, please email me and introduce about yourself, and let me know phone number for an appointment to view this unit.
Thanks a lot.
